entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
